content:
We are asked to advertise CMCS 2024, the workshop on Coalgebraic Methods in Computer Science.
Previous CMCS papers have recently been mentioned under coalgebras, operational semantics and the Giry monad, and F-Alg as 2limit, and probably other places too.

Submission deadline: 29 January 2024 (abstracts)
Workshop: 6-7 April 2024 in Luxembourg as part of ETAPS.
https://www.coalg.org/cmcs24/
